preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 240 g of aluminum using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 180 g of arsenic carefully in a fume hood or well-ventilated area. 
 3. Measure 100 g of cesium. 
 4. Measure 40 g of potassium. 
 5. Combine aluminum and arsenic in a stainless steel mixing container, ensuring even distribution. 
 6. Gradually add cesium and potassium while continuously mixing to prevent clumping.
